text:
#Herpes zoster following BNT162b2 #mRNA #COVID19 #vaccination in patients with autoimmune inflammatory rheumatic diseases: a case series

The first in a lifetime event of HZ developed after the 1st #vaccine dose in 5 cases and after the 2d dose in 1 case.
https://t.co/9njt8r7qZc https://t.co/aX9Su9eJNI
